name: wfis
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0
body: -| wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wi(wral(s1, cpred(c1, c0, cv(s0)), wsbc(s0, cv(s1), w0)), w0))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0)
-| wral(s0, c0, w0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0)
-| wral(s0, c0, w0)

stmt.origin: mp2an(wral(s0, c0, w0), wwe(c1, c0), wse(c1, c0))

body.origin:
|- wral(s0, c0, w0)
-| wwe(c1, c0)
-| wse(c1, c0)
-| wi(wa(wwe(c1, c0), wse(c1, c0)), wral(s0, c0, w0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0)
-| wwe(c1, c0)
-| wse(c1, c0)
-| wi(wa(wwe(c1, c0), wse(c1, c0)), wral(s0, c0, w0))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wwe(c1, c0), wse(c1, c0)), wral(s0, c0, w0))
-| wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wi(wral(s1, cpred(c1, c0, cv(s0)), wsbc(s0, cv(s1), w0)), w0))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsc(s0, c1)
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s1, c1)
-| diffsc(s1, c0)
-| diffsw(s1, w0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0)
-| wwe(c1, c0)
-| wse(c1, c0)
-| wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wi(wral(s1, cpred(c1, c0, cv(s0)), wsbc(s0, cv(s1), w0)), w0))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsc(s0, c1)
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s1, c1)
-| diffsc(s1, c0)
-| diffsw(s1, w0)

comment: Well-Founded Induction Schema. If all elements less than a given set ` x ` of the well-founded class ` A ` have a property (induction hypothesis), then all elements of ` A ` have that property. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 29-Jan-2011.)
